item.title: mt3 nearly ready to glue
item.description: 20:02 Saturday 30 September 2017 JST To be honest, this is taking longer than even I expected. I need to plan ahead a bit better to put characters where the need to be to glue stuff down, etc. I have spent 70+ hours on MT3 so far. Two livestreams today https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EeY85MnK_y4 and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tZAxfzXo63I
